trends: There has been one other sighting in Powell
There were no other sightings in Powell on or around July 31st 2007
divs: Sighting DetailsWhile driving on 270 getting off on 33N I noticed a bright shining circle in the sky. It hovered for few moments and then disappeared. Then I saw another appear underneath it to the left. Then they both disappeared then another appeared to the right of those two. Then the other two reappeared and I drove off. I called my wife and told her, and all of my children in the car saw the objects as well. The oldest wouldn't venture into the basement in fear of aliens after we returned home.....Wierd! I normally don't even look into things like this, but after what I saw I needed to find an outlet to share. Please if anyone else saw these shining objects post on here as well. Oh yeah and they were shiny metal. Like white metal.
Summary: Three very bright shining circles with a half oval tops appearing and dissapearing in the clear sky.
